title: Sets: construction and display
creator_contributor_role: Centre for Educational Television Overseas, production company
subject_group: Advertising, Film, Journalism, Mass Media & TV/Television - Production and direction
Advertising, Film, Journalism, Mass Media & TV/Television - Lighting
Advertising, Film, Journalism, Mass Media & TV/Television - Equipment and supplies
Advertising, Film, Journalism, Mass Media & TV/Television
Advertising, Film, Journalism, Mass Media & TV/Television - Stage-setting and scenery
description: Studies television studio set design, concentrating on three common production situations: - the `presenter set', the `interview set', and the `drama set'. Includes details of their design, planning and construction. Emphasises the need for co-ordination with studio engineers. Well presented and easy to understand with good use of models as an instructive tool.
